_AUTHINFO Struct Reference
[HTTP, HTTP]

#include <pro/httpd.h>

Detailed Description

HTTP authorization information structure.


Data Fields

AUTHINFO * auth_next
 Link to next AUTHINFO structure.
char * auth_dirname
 Pathname of protected directory.
char * auth_login
 Login user and password, separated by a colon.
